title: Stephen Moore Reacts to His Nomination to the Federal Reserve Board
text:
Heritage Foundation distinguished visiting fellow Stephen Moore released the following statement regarding his nomination to the Federal Reserve Board:

"To be asked by President Trump to serve on the Federal Reserve Board is a distinct honor. I look forward to my discussions with senators on the Senate Banking Committee during the confirmation process. My goal, if confirmed, is to be an advocate for robust economic growth, rising living standards, and stable prices. Alongside Chairman Powell, I will work to promote monetary policies that will help keep the economy prosperous with three to four percent real growth at full employment with rising worker wages."
